description: Application to clear condition 6 (Implementation of Flood Risk Measures) and 11 (As-Built SAP Outputs) of approved application DM2022/01889.
decision_conditions: Prior to first occupation of the dwelling, written confirmation that the approved site drainage and flood risk management measures, including SuDS, have been implemented as part of the development as built must be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing. Where different from the approved details, further calculations carried out by an appropriately qualified professional must be provided to show that the peak run-off rate for the 1 in 100 year 6-hour rainfall event (plus 40% for climate change) will be as close as reasonably practicable to the calculated greenfield run-off rate for the same event and no more than 3 times the calculated greenfield run-off rate for the same event. All of the approved measures must thereafter be retained for as long as the development is in existence.Reason: To comply with Policy SI 13 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy 32 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018.

The development hereby permitted shall be constructed in accordance with the approved Energy Statement for Planning (Base Energy, August 2020) (Rev0). Prior to first occupation, 'as-built' Standard Assessment Procedure (SAP) outputs must be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to demonstrate that the development has been carried out in accordance with the approved energy strategy. If the development is unable to meet the required reduction in CO2 emissions, any shortfall shall be made up through the application of further sustainability measures. All of the approved measures must thereafter be retained for as long as the development is in existence.Reason: To comply with Policy SI 2 of the London Plan 2021 and Policy 31 of the Sutton Local Plan 2018
